languages.text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} increases the death world character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +5.
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.
languages.original_text:
Каждое {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} персонажа с мира смерти на 5.
Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травма{/g} считается за 3 ранения.

traits.locale_text:
Every Injury increases Death World Character's Agility and Willpower by 5.
Every Trauma counts as 3 Injuries.

Every Trauma counts as 3 Injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Каждое ранение увеличивает Ловкость и Волю персонажа из мира смерти на 5.
Каждая травма считается за 3 ранения.

Каждое ранение увеличивает Ловкость и Волю персонажа из мира смерти на 5.
Каждая травма считается за 3 ранения.

languages.text:
Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} des Todesweltcharakters um +5.
Jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} zählt als 3 Verletzungen.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Jede Verletzung erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} des Todesweltcharakters um 5.
Jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} zählt als 3 Verletzungen.

languages.text:
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} augmente de +5 l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} des personnages des mondes hostiles.
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} équivaut à 3 blessures.
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} increases the death world character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +5.
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} augmente de +5 l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} des personnages des mondes hostiles.
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} équivaut à 3 blessures.

languages.text:
每当死亡世界的角色承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。
每处{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}视为3次伤势。
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} increases the death world character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +5.
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.

traits.locale_text:
每当死亡世界的角色承受伤势时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。
每处{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}视为3次伤势。

languages.text:
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del personaje de mundo letal en +5.
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} cuenta como 3 lesiones.
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} increases the death world character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +5.
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.

traits.locale_text:
Cada lesión aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del personaje de mundo letal en 5.
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} cuenta como 3 lesiones.

languages.text:
死地惑星のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}1つごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が5増加する。
{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}は1つにつき負傷3つ分とみなされる。
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} increases the death world character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by +5.
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} counts as 3 injuries.

traits.locale_text:
死地惑星のキャラクターは負傷1つごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が5増加する。
{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}は1つにつき負傷3つ分とみなされる。

languages.text:
Her {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g}, ölüm dünyası karakterinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini +5 artırır.
Her {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g}, 3 sakatlık olarak sayılır.
